summary: Build a Valentine-themed website dedicated to the user's girlfriend Ahana.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Romantic heart-pattern background with soft gradients (ahana-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Cute Valentine-themed envelope-and-heart illustration, flat/vector style (ahana-hero-illustration.dim_1200x800.png)
- Small heart icon, simple flat style (heart-icon.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive, single-page Valentine website dedicated to the name “Ahana”, with all user-facing text in English and a romantic tone.

Implement a coherent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) suitable for a Valentine/love-letter aesthetic, applied consistently across the page (avoid a blue/purple primary palette).

Add core sections to the page: (1) Hero banner, (2) Short love note/letter, (3) “Reasons I love you” list (static), and (4) A closing call-to-action section such as “Will you be my Valentine?” with simple on-page interaction (no authentication).

Add lightweight decorative animations suitable for the theme (e.g., floating hearts or subtle sparkles) that respect performance and accessibility (provide a way to reduce motion if the user prefers reduced motion).
Add required static image assets to the project and render them on the page from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve images via the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a Valentine website for girlfriend named “Ahana” (romantic themed, personalized).
